meanings.definition: A small crustacean that is a major component of plankton.
meanings.sent1: The copepod swam gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study copepods to learn more about plankton.
meanings.sent3: Why did the copepod bring a tiny suitcase to the plankton party? It wanted to travel light!
meanings.sent4: The copepod danced through the water like a tiny ballerina.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering copepod stood out among the plankton like a sparkling jewel.

meanings.definition: Any of numerous small marine or freshwater crustaceans of the subclass Copepoda.
meanings.sent1: I saw a copepod swimming in the freshwater lake.
meanings.sent2: Copepods play a vital role in the marine ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: Why did the copepod refuse to share its shrimp snack? It was shellfish!
meanings.sent4: The copepod scurried along the ocean floor like a tiny crab.
meanings.sent5: The colorful copepod stood out in the clear water like a tiny rainbow.
